gui.landmgr.landperm.other_options.fireg: Allow fire with flint and steel
gui.landmgr.landperm.other_options.trapd: Allow opening and closing of trapdoors
gui.landmgr.landperm.other_options.fence: Allow opening and closing of fence gates
gui.landmgr.landperm.other_options.respa: Allows the use of respawn anchors
gui.landmgr.landperm.editevent: To control events that can occur in (nearby) land, please go to the land settings tab.
gui.fastlmgr.title: Main Land Menu
gui.fastlmgr.content: You are now on §l<a>§r and can use the following options to quickly manage your land.
gui.fastgde.title: Land shortcut menu
gui.fastgde.content:
Welcome to the land system
you have §l<a>§r land in total.

§lPlease Chose...
gui.oplandmgr.landmgr.title: Land Data Management
gui.oplandmgr.plugin.title: Plugin Settings
gui.oplandmgr.plugin.tip: Plugins can be configured here, and changes will take effect immediately.
gui.listenmgr.title: Listener Manager
gui.listenmgr.tip: §lWarning§r Do not disable a listener unless you know what you're doing!
path.<config> this.features.player_selec: Show player count on a single page
path.<config> this.land.max_lands: Max amount of land per player
gui.buyland.chosedim: Please select the type of land you want to create
gui.buyland.unsupport: This server does not currently support <a> land selections
gui.buyland.content:
Land selection completed!
Volume: <a>x<b>x<c> <d> block
Price: <e> <f> 
Wallet: <g> <f>
gui.buyland.succeed: The land was purchased successfully! Do you want to open the land manager now?
gui.delland.content:
Are you sure you want to delete your land?
If so, you will receive a <a><b>refund. Your land will then lose its protection and the data will be deleted immediately.
gui.landdescribe.tip:
Land notifications are sent to other visitors when they visit your land.

Supported variables:
$visitor = visitor name
$n = newline
gui.landtrust.fail.cantaddown: Cannot add yourself to the trust list
gui.landtrust.fail.alreadyexists: The player already exists in the trust list
gui.landtag.tip: Land Nickname helps you to distinguish between multiple lands without changing the original lands configuration
gui.landtransfer.tip: After the land transfer is completed, all permissions will be transferred, you are no longer the owner of the land, but all configurations of the original land will not be changed.
gui.reselectland.title: Reselect Land Claim
gui.reselectland.tip:
Completely reselect the area of the land, not directly expanding/reducing the size of the existing land.
The price calculation method of reselected land is "New land price — old land price", continue?
gui.reselectland.content:
Original land range (<a>) value: <b>,
Current land range (<c>) value: <d>,
will <e> you <f> <g>.
gui.landtp.point: Successfully set location [<a>] as teleportation point for land <b>.
gui.landtp.tip: Please select the target land to teleport
gui.itemselector.mgrpl.title: Player Selector
gui.itemselector.mgrpl.tip_usage: Select the player to be managed, please do not select more than one.
gui.itemselector.mgrpl.tip_search: If there are too many players, you can use this tool to filter.
gui.itemselector.trust.title: Player Selector
gui.itemselector.trust.tip_usage: Select players who need to trust/cancel, you can select more than one.
gui.itemselector.trust.tip_search: If there are too many players, you can use this tool to filter.
gui.itemselector.transfer.title: Player Selector
gui.itemselector.transfer.tip_usage: Select the player to transfer, please do not select multiple.
gui.itemselector.transfer.tip_search: If there are too many players, you can use this tool to filter.
gui.itemselector.land.title: Land Selector
gui.itemselector.land.tip_usage: Select the land to be managed, please do not select more than one.
gui.itemselector.land.tip_search: If there are too many territories, you can use this tool to filter.
gui.itemselector.search.tip:
§lInstructions§r <a> If there is no target item on the current page, please select the next page and submit.
If you use the search tool to enter keywords, you can submit it directly.
gui.itemselector.jumpto: Select the number of pages to jump to (if needed)
gui.itemselector.toomany: Multiple items cannot be selected at the same time
gui.rangeselector.title: Y-axis adjustment
gui.rangeselector.tip: You can adjust the height of the existing start and end points here. If you don't need to adjust, you can submit it directly.
title.rangeselector.selectpoint:
Please hold <a>
click the square or use the /land set to select a <b> point.
title.rangeselector.dimension.tip:
§l3D§r Select two points, and use the two points as vertices as the land.
§l2D§r Determine the XZ coordinates with the two points, and the entire y-axis is for the land.
title.rangeselector.dimension.blocked: This land selection mode has been disabled by the administrator
title.rangeselector.fail.dimdiff: The operation failed, please do not select points across dimensions!
title.rangeselector.fail.dimblocked: The administrator has disabled the land selection function for this dimension
title.rangeselector.fail.outmode: Currently not in land selection mode
title.rangeselector.fail.toobig: The selected land is too big, please re-select it.
title.rangeselector.fail.toosmall: The selected land is too small, please re-select.
title.rangeselector.fail.toolow: The selected land is too low, please re-select
title.rangeselector.fail.height: Not a valid height, please re-select
title.rangeselector.largeparticle: The land is large, particle effects have been turned off to avoid lag
title.selectland.complete2:
Please hold <a>
Use /<b> or click any square again to create an order.
gui.rangecheck.title: There was a problem
gui.rangecheck.msg:
The selected range conflicts with or is too close to §l<a>§r.

Details: <b>

title.landtransfer.targetlimit: Target player cannot have more lands.

title.landmgr.failed: There is no land to manage, use "/land new" to create one!

title.reselectland.succeed: Succeed selected! The new land has taken effect.
title.landlimit.noperm: This is private land, you have no right to operate
title.landlimit.nearby: Too close to someone else's land, the operation is canceled

api.safetp.fail.timeout: Block loading timed out, transfer failed
api.safetp.fail.nofoothold: There is no foothold near the teleportation point, the teleportation failed
talk.features.closed: This feature has been closed by the land administrator
talk.feature.disabled: The administrator has disabled this feature
talk.prejoin.noxuid: Sorry, players joining a server using the iLand plugin must have a HUID.
talk.gametype.creative: Creative mode player <a> detected, some controls will be disabled for creative mode players.
command.land_mgr: Open the OP land console interface
command.land_mgr.noperm: §eThis command is exclusive to the land manager, please use §l/land op "<a>"§r§e in the console to add yourself as a land manager.
console.loading.config.notfound: The configuration file (config.json) does not exist, creating...
console.loading.config.itemlost: Configuration item <a> is missing, reset to default.
console.loading.config.autocorrect: The configuration item <a> is incorrect and has been fixed automatically.
console.loading.land.notfound: The land data file (data.json) does not exist, creating...
console.loading.land.invalild: Land (Id: <a>) range information is missing and has been cleared.
console.loading.land.broken: The land data file is broken.
console.loading.relationship.notfound: The relationship data (relationship.json) does not exist, creating...
console.loading.relationship.xuidinvalid: Some players were not loaded because their XUIDs were not in the database. Reloading these players could fix the problem.
console.loading.relationship.broken: The land relationship data file is broken.
console.loading.map.load: Building the tables needed to run...
console.landop.add.success: Successfully added <a> (<b>) as a land administrator.
console.landop.add.failbyexist: Player <a> is already a Landop Admin.
console.landop.del.success: <a> (<b>) has been removed from the list of land admins.
console.landop.del.failbynull: Player <a> is not a land admin.
console.landop.failbyxuid: Cannot find the XUID information of <a>, please re-enter the server or check the case and try again.
console.update.nodata: No data, you need to allow the plugin to connect to the Internet to use this command.
console.update.newversion: Get the new version <a>, you can use /land update to automatically update it!
console.update.force: Sorry, due to cloud settings, your iLand must be updated to <a> before it can be used. Forced updates are mostly enabled when older versions have serious problems.
console.update.unsupport: Sorry, the current LXL version does not match the cloud version, so automatic updates are stopped.
console.update.vacancy: Sorry, the current version differs from the cloud version by more than one version, please update manually.
console.update.disabled: Automatic update is disabled in cloud settings, please update manually in time.
console.update.auto: Beginning to update your iLand to a new version because you have auto-update turned on...
console.update.restart: The server needs to be restarted to take effect after the update is complete.
console.autoupdate.alreadylatest: Update stopped because it is already the latest version (<a>).
console.autoupdate.errorbydown: Failed to download file <a> with error code: <b>. Please check your network or report an issue, update has been interrupted.
console.autoupdate.recoverbackup: Backup has been restored, using an older version of iLand.
console.autoupdate.errorbyverify: Failed to verify file <a>, please check your network or report problems, update has been interrupted.
console.autoupdate.success: Auto update completed, please restart the server for the update to take effect.
console.announcement.founded: Received an online announcement with the following content:
console.getonline.failbycode: Failed to get cloud information, error code: <a>.
console.getonline.failbyver: Unparseable version of cloud info file (<a>), your iLand may be out of date.
console.getonline.failbybroken: Unable to parse cloud information, JSON parsing failed.
console.languages.sign: This server is using language <a>, version: <b>.
console.languages.list-online.wait: Please wait, getting language warehouse data...
console.languages.install.misspara: Missing parameter, example: "land language install vi_VN"
console.languages.install.existed: Language is already installed, to update please use "land language update"
console.languages.install.notfound: The language to install "<a>" was not found, please use "land language list-online" to list all installable languages.
console.languages.install.fail.stat: Error downloading language <a>, installation process has been interrupted.
console.languages.install.fail.verify: Error verifying language <a>, MD5 mismatch, installation process interrupted.
console.languages.install.fail.version: The language <a> being installed does not match the version of iLand currently running and the installation process has been interrupted.
console.languages.install.fail.broken: The language pack <a> being installed is broken and the installation process was interrupted.
console.languages.install.succeed: Language pack <a> installed successfully! Please use "land language set <a>" to set the language used.
console.languages.update.alreadylatest: This language version is up to date and does not require an upgrade.
console.languages.update.notfound: Language pack <a> not found, please try installing this language with "land language install <a>".
console.languages.update.notfoundonline: Language <a> was not found on the server, maybe it is not yet included, the update is aborted.
console.languages.update.broken: The fetched <a> language is broken and the upgrade failed.
console.error.money.protocol: Unknown economy component '<a>' is being used.
console.error.money.scorenull: The scoreboard object cannot be accessed, possibly the corresponding economic scoreboard does not exist. Please use /land mgr to change to the correct scoreboard or try restarting the server.
